Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Northbound Reroute near Damen/15th
ShortDescription: NB 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 18th, Wood, 14th, and Damen due to street blockage, near Damen/15th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 18th, Wood, 14th, and Damen due to street blockage near Damen/15th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
